text: Roy Kent Head (January 9, 1941 - September 21, 2020) was an rockabilly American singer-songwriter. He was best known for his hit record "Treat Her Right". He was born in Three Rivers, Texas. Head died on September 21, 2020 from a heart attack in Montgomery County, Texas at the age of 79.
